articles.title: Macron says Russian defeat in Ukraine vital for security in Europe - BBC.com
articles.description: France's president says European states will give Ukraine medium- and long-range missiles and bombs.
articles.content:
By Jaroslav LukivBBC News
Ukraine says its forces are currently outgunned by Russian troops, asking allies for urgent weapons supplies
French President Emmanuel Macron has said it is key for Europe… [+5181 chars]
